# manufacturer

**Instance Property**

The manufacturer of the accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
var manufacturer: String? { get }
```

## Getting manufacturer information

- **firmwareVersion**: The firmware version of the accessory.
- **model**: The model name of the accessory.
